currentPlans.item: Alwar. Working from home, it's winters. Peaceful.
Keeping up with the daily flood of AI advancements.
AI-based Mental Health support app with a team of 5 people - Demo accessible at mindcare-ai.surge.sh
The personal finance app I started is currently on the back burner. I'm letting it sit while I regain some creative energy.
Trying to recalibrate my sleep schedule (3 AM nights have become too frequent) and re-introducing Pomodoro timers to manage screen fatigue.
Recently switched to a Samsung Galaxy Fold 5. It is an interesting shift in form factor that I'm still getting used to.
